entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Snow level rising to 2000 metres late in the afternoon.
